Adventure.Core
Class Player

java.lang.Object
  Adventure.Core.Player

public class Player
extends java.lang.Object

This class is used to represent the user within the game.

Author:
Firmy

Field Summary
private static java.util.ArrayList<GameItem> inventory
          This field holds an ArrayList of all GAmeItems in the carried by the Player.
private static GameLocation location
          This field holds the Player's current location.
private static int maxWeight
          This field holds the value for the maximum combined weight of items in the Players inventory.
private static int moves
          This field holds the number of moves between locations the Player has made.
private static GameLocation previousLocation
          This field holds the location that the Player was in before the current location.
private static java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> status
          This field holds an Array List of status tags for the Player.
 
Constructor Summary
private Player()
          This constructor is Private so there can not be an instance of the Player class.

static boolean checkStatus(java.lang.String statusItem)
          This method will check if the player has been marked with a given status.

          This method will take an item from the Player's inventory and place it into their current locations items list.

moves

private static int moves
This field holds the number of moves between locations the Player has made.

maxWeight

private static int maxWeight
This field holds the value for the maximum combined weight of items in the Players inventory.

status

private static java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> status
This field holds an Array List of status tags for the Player. Any tag in this list will have a status of true.

Constructor Detail

Player

private Player()
This constructor is Private so there can not be an instance of the Player class. All of the methods of this class are static.

Method Detail

location

public static void location(GameLocation newLocation)
This setter method will update the Player's current location, set the previous location to the current location, and increment the number of moves for the Player.

Parameters:
newLocation - The GameLocation to set as the current location.

maxWeight

public static void maxWeight(int newMaxWeight)
This setter method is used to assign a new weight maximum for the Player.

Parameters:
newMaxWeight - The new maximum weight value to assign.

updateStatus

public static void updateStatus(java.lang.String statusItem)
This method will either set or unset the Player's status for the given name.

Parameters:
statusItem - The String name of the status item to update.

moves

public static int moves()
This getter method will get the number of moves taken by the Player.

Returns:
The number of moves made by the Player.

maxWeight

public static int maxWeight()
This getter method gets the current maximum weight for the Players inventory.

Returns:
The maximum inventory weight value.

inventoryWeight

public static int inventoryWeight()
This getter method will calculate the combined weight of all the items in the Players inventory.

Returns:
The combined weight of all the GameItems carried by the Player.

location

public static GameLocation location()
This getter method will get the Player's current location.

Returns:
The GameLocation that the Player is currently in.

previousLocation

public static GameLocation previousLocation()
This getter method will get the Player's previous location.

Returns:
The GameLocation that the Player is was in last.

item

public static GameItem item(java.lang.String itemName)
This getter method is used to retrieve a single item from the Player's inventory by name.

Parameters:
itemName - The String name of the item to retrieve.
Returns:
The GameItem object that has the specified name, or null if none is found.

hasItem

public static boolean hasItem(java.lang.String itemName)
This method is used to determine if the item with the given name is currently in the Player's inventory.

Parameters:
itemName - The String name of the item to look for.
Returns:
True if the Player is carrying the item, false otherwise.

checkStatus

public static boolean checkStatus(java.lang.String statusItem)
This method will check if the player has been marked with a given status.

Parameters:
statusItem - The String name of the status item
Returns:
True if the Player is marked as having the specified status, false otherwise.

move

public static void move(java.lang.String direction)
This method will move the Player to the location that is in the specified direction.

Parameters:
direction - The String direction to move in.

pickUpItem

public static void pickUpItem(java.lang.String itemName)
This method will take an item from the Player's current location and place it into their inventory.

Parameters:
itemName - The String name of the item to pick up.

dropItem

public static void dropItem(java.lang.String itemName)
This method will take an item from the Player's inventory and place it into their current locations items list.

Parameters:
itemName - The String name of the item to drop.

displayInventory

public static void displayInventory()
This method will add the Player's inventory to the output.

speakTo

public static void speakTo(java.lang.String actorName)
This method will begin a conversation with the actor in the Player's current location who has the specified name.

Parameters:
actorName - The String name of the GameActor to speak to.

examine

public static void examine(java.lang.String whatToExamine)
This method is used to add the description for the specified GameObject to the output.

Parameters:
whatToExamine -

skipTurn

public static void skipTurn()
This method will increment the Player's moves without doing anything else.

giveItem

public static void giveItem(java.lang.String itemName,
                            GameActor actor)
This method will remove a specified item from the Player's inventory and give it to the specified actor.
